ua.training

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.training.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements game logic. Dedicated for generating new random number in given range, check if given number is correct and keep some statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • isCorrect

        public boolean isCorrect(int number)
        Checks if given number is correct. If it's correct then return true. Otherwise method sets new limit (right or left - depending on given number) and return false.
        Parameters:
        number - given number
        Returns:
        true - if correct, else - false

      • thinkOfNewNumber

        public void thinkOfNewNumber()
        Sets new correct number.

      • generateNewNumber

        public int generateNewNumber()
        Generates new number between left and right limits.
        Returns:
        new number between left and right limits.

      • setLimits

        public void setLimits(int min,
                      int max)
        Sets new limits.
        Parameters:
        min - left limit of range in which will be correct number.
        max - right limit of range in which will be correct number.
